title: Asian forex tepid on uncertain rate-cut outlook as equities jump
summary: Most equities in emerging Asia advanced on Tuesday, led by strong performances in Singapore and South Korea, while currencies remained largely subdued as traders were uncertain about the timing of US interest rate cuts.
content:
(March 26): Most equities in emerging Asia advanced on Tuesday, led by strong performances in Singapore and South Korea, while currencies remained largely subdued as traders were uncertain about the timing of US interest rate cuts.

summary: The rise in the service tax from 6% to 8% would only have a minimal impact on inflation, estimated at 0.2 percentage points, owing to its limited scope, which exempts essential services and basic necessities, says Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim.
content:
